<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="DistributionList-2">593e557183132210acf7f0ffeeaad321</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Hide DL List Details</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    // Replace 'variable_set_name' with the actual name of your variable set
    var variableSetName = 'distribution_list_details';
    
    // Get the variable set element
    var variableSet = g_form.getControl(variableSetName);
    
    // Check if the variable set exists and hide it
    if (variableSet) {
        g_form.setDisplay(variableSetName, false);
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-12 03:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>023ed9b183132210acf7f0ffeeaad3a3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide DL List Details</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="DistributioncList" source="x_1645407_distlist">105c471b83322210acf7f0ffeeaad3d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DistributioncList">105c471b83322210acf7f0ffeeaad3d2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_023ed9b183132210acf7f0ffeeaad3a3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-12 03:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
